org.grobid.core.annotations
Class Annotation

java.lang.Object
  org.grobid.core.annotations.Annotation

public class Annotation
extends Object

That object takes a list of PatentItem and/or BibDataSet and generate the annotation in tei format to insert inside the xml.

Author:
Damien

Method Detail

getHeaderAnnotation

public String getHeaderAnnotation(boolean pIndent)
Generate thre header from the patents, articles and description got in the constructor.

Returns:
The header annotation corresponding to the description. If both patents and articles lists are empty an empty String is returned.

addListItems

                     throws GrobidException,
                            XMLStreamException
Add the items (patents and articles).

Throws:
GrobidException
XMLStreamException

addItem

protected void addItem(Object pCurrItem)
                throws XMLStreamException,
                       GrobidException
Add an annotation to the writer with the pCurrItem given in argument. pCurrItem has to be either an instance of PatentItem or BibDataSet.

Parameters:
pCurrItem - either an instance of PatentItem or BibDataSet.
Throws:
XMLStreamException
GrobidException

buildItem

protected void buildItem(String pTei,
                         String pPointer,
                         double pConfidence,
                         String pStrConfidence,
                         String pDate)
                  throws XMLStreamException
Generate the item in TEI format.

Parameters:
pTei - The TEI of the item.
pPointer - The TEI pointer.
pConfidence - The degree of confidence.
pStrConfidence - The label of degree of confidence.
Throws:
XMLStreamException

"..." annotation element.
